name: Bomballded
description:
Watch KB play the game while we hung out in chat. Thanks for hosting the jam KB:

Played dodgeball in school? Lets see if you can dodgeballs here.

Ready yourself to be bombarded with dodgeballs.

Each ball will have a random character from a device, based on the mode you choose.

The game has 4 modes to choose from. Press the correct key, and dodge the ball.

The game starts off with only 1 opponent chucking balls at you frequently. This frequency increases with time upto a certain threshold.

As time goes on, the number of opponents also increases, and you're bombarded with even more.

When a ball reaches close enough, it will slow the game, so that you have some time to react. After that, BAM!!! You take the ball to the face.

4 Game Modes are as follows:

1. Keyboard only: Randoms between A-Z and 0-9

2. Left Keyboard Right Gamepad: Randoms between Keyboard's A-G, Q-T, V-Z, 1-6 and

XBox Controller's A, X, B, Y, Right Stick Press, Right Trigger, Right Shoulder, Start.

3. Right Keyboard Left Gamepad: Randoms between Keyboard's H-P, U, 7-0 and

XBox Controller's D-Pad Up/Down/Left/Right, Left Stick Press, Left Trigger,LeftShoulder, Select.

4. Gamepad only: Randoms between XBox Controller's buttons.

Note: NumPad not allowed. Dodging gives 12/15/15/10 points based on selected mode, due to device's complexity.

Resources used:

1. https://opengameart.org/content/keyboard

2. https://pixabay.com/vectors/xbox-kontroller-gaming-controller-5162428/

3. https://youtu.be/JBsk2HCyrOI

4. DoTween plugin (Unity)

5. Newtonsoft plugin (Visual Studio nuget)
